Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、もしさ……女王様のフォルスを使って、 ザピィとボクの心が入れ替わったら……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, what if... Zapie and I got switched using the Queen's Force?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ、それ？ そんな事あるわけねーじゃん。
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you asking that? There's no way such a thing's gonna happen.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから……もしも、もしもだよ……そうなったら、 ボクってザピィなのかな、ボクなのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Ok, but what if it did? Would I be Zapie, or would I be me?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえ、難しい事言うねぇ…… ううーん……よくわかんねぇけど……
Entry.EnglishText: You're asking some hard questions... Hmmm... I don't really know, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ザピィになっても<Mao>は<Mao>じゃないのか？ 言葉は通じないだろうけどさ。
Entry.EnglishText: Even if you were to become Zapie, you'd still be you? Though I don't think you'd be able to speak at all.
I guess that's how it would go...
